summary: Vim syntax file for the TreeDL 2.3 language
name: tdl.vim
description: TreeDL stands for Tree Description Language. See http://treedl.sourceforge.net for details.
install_details:
Copy tdl.vim to the `runtimepath/syntax' directory. Add the following line to the `runtimepath/filetype.vim' file:
	au BufNewFile,BufRead *.tdl             setf tdl
